Author: Hidai Bar-Mor <hidai25@gmail.com>
Date:   Thu Jan 1 22:55:06 2026 +0200
fix: goose adapter not being selected from test case
Goose adapter was skipped because CLI required an endpoint.
Added goose to list of adapters that work without endpoint (like openai-assistants).
evalview/cli.py | 13 +++++++++++--
1 file changed, 11 insertions(+), 2 deletions(-)
### Summary of the Last Commit

**Commit ID:** 7f18119bb05a24eb234f74b80848da23032a53b8  
**Author:** Hidai Bar-Mor  
**Date:** January 1, 2026

#### Changes Made:
- **Fix:** The Goose adapter was not being selected during test cases due to the CLI requiring an endpoint.
- **Modification:** Added the Goose adapter to the list of adapters that can operate without an endpoint, similar to the functionality of `openai-assistants`.

#### File Modified:
- **File:** `evalview/cli.py`
  - **Lines Changed:** 13 lines modified (11 additions, 2 deletions) 

This commit addresses an issue to ensure that the Goose adapter is correctly recognized in scenarios where an endpoint is not required.
